body.p: << First Page | < Previous Page | Page #19 of 32 | Next Page > | Last Page >>

td.p: Thomson, John. Journal, Mackenzie River, 1800-1802. An electronic transcription. MFTP #0021

div.p: Tuesday the 16th[.] Sent the young Man back to his Snares. The other 2 hunters brought in evening 31 hares – & 5 Pichue skins[.] Greased & arranged the guns, there is 2 of them a good deal damaged, owing to their being Packed up last Fall, without their Feurreaus, or even a Blanket to wrap round them, one in particular has the Stock broke I am much afraid hors de service[.]

Wednesday the 17th[.] Sent the hunters to their Snares – one of them wanted very much to go away, as he says he fares very ill here Living only upon hares – & as he has an orignal En Cache which is much better, he longs very much to go & eat it[.] The young Man from the other side arrived[,] he brought 18 hares & all the Snares as he wishes already to go away[.] In the evening the Little Chiefs Brother in law & youngest Son arrived. [T]hey brought a little Meat, the former is come to get a few Credits, gave them each a Small bit of Tobacco[.]

Thursday the 18th[.] Traded 4 Skins fresh Meat & 1 Dried Beaver, & gave the Little Chiefs Brother in law 46 Skins Credits which done they went their ways. Sent the Sick Man along with him[.] The Rabbit hunter also went away on condition of his coming back in 10 days hence with the Meat of an orignal that he put en Cache on the other side[.] In the evening a young Man came for Tobacco for the Arrival of as he said Laverdiese & another young Man – sent him one foot, a little after he arrived with 9 young Men at his Tail[,] received them according to the usual custom[.] They are the same Indians that I sent back for their Credits the 21st ulto[.]

Friday the 19th[.] Received 143 Skins Credits[.] Traded 40 Skins principally Beaver, also 4 Skins fatt, 3 cascamisks[,] 2 Bear thigs, 3 Weazles, 1 Porcupine belt & 4 Skins hare Snares[,] they brought 50 or 60 old white Fish to trade, but I would not Trade a single one as they were not worth the picking up[.] Gave out 271 Skins on Credit – to old Laverdiese for nothing the value of 4 Skins in triffles – & to other good hunters 3 flints & 2 gun worms[.] Early in the afternoon they all went away, except a Boy whom I kept

td.p:
L E G E N D :
in red , modifications made by the editor(s).
in lavender , modifications made by the assumed author(s).
